summary: A simple but yet an inmersive and battle hardened retexture for the amazing ESO Nord armor by Newermind43
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80198-3-1479045565.jpg[/img]
[size=4]This is my own retexture of the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68530/?]Eso Nord Armor [/url]made by the awesome Newermind43.

When i first saw the ESO trailer i fell in love with nord armor, and i wish to have it on Skyrim. Thanks to Newemind43 now all of us can enjoy this model. Although I really appreciate the work done by Newermid43, i think the textures arent good enough for this awesome armor. For me it looks unrealistic, non lore-friendly at all, the steel plates feel like plastic, the leather is brand new, and i think thats not the correct feeling  of the armor.

I tested the other retextures on Nexus (fadingsignal and Bulldog) but neither of this like me. Although the textures made by fadingsignal make it more older and rough, i still thinking the same. So i decide to create my own retexture and be part of this awesome armor and contribute with my little effort to the community.

After hours of testing and creating i think i have one retexture that can be suitable to the lore-friendly, realistic, rough and battle-worn look i want.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80198-0-1479047099.jpg[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80198-0-1479047619.jpg[/img]
[/size][size=4][quote]"I always hated the black gloves, even though it is accurate. Replacing the black with chainmail was brilliant. Standing next to the guard shows how well the armor blends into the game."

"I like Gamwich's version, as well as this one. Great job. You can't have too many good retextures." jayr848[/quote]

Please feel free to use it and change it as you wish to create your own custom armor. Also i will appreciate if you can take some pictures and show all how it looks in-game.


A) INSTALLATION - UNINSTALLATION
Manual - Simply extract to your Skyrim folder /Delete the files
NMM - Use it as normal /Deactivate the mod


[/size][size=3]B) CHANGELOG - VERSION 1-
-Completely new textures for all the major pieces, take from here and there and personal tweaked.
-The black shirt is now a HQ chainmail.
-The leather is now made like a real leather which has a lot stories behind him, with details.
-Change the colour of the gloves with the original colour version of Newermind43, with fadingsignal retexture they are way too dark.
-The horns now has new textures to be like a real polished horn.
-Change the shiny (Metal_e) of the metal, to have more contrast and saturation, less shiny and more detailed.
-The plates all are redone with another material to be like metal (no more plastic plates!!), added custom scars, gaps, stains and more. All of them are individually done.
-The pelt now has another mix of colour, more appropiate.
-The helmet now have a few flame decoration (look amazing).
-The cape and the loincloth have darker colour with more saturation, contrast etc.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/5396122-1441122472.jpg[/img]


C) CREDITS/ THANKS
-Thanks to Newermind43 for creating such and awesome armor.
-Thanks to [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/2546964-fadingsignal/]fadingsignal[/url] for his permission to upload my custom retexture as i used his personal retexture as a base for mine.
-I used some of [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/571605-cabal120/]CaBal120[/url]  textures as an asset for the leather (from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url] -Ancient Nord Armor), the horn (from aMidianBorn Book of Silence -Iron Armor) and the pelt (from aMidianBorn Book of Silence -Wolf Armor brown). I highly recommend you his mod!!!
-Thanks to all Nexus and Skyrim players and modders, you are doing the game even greater!!!

D) RECOMMENDED MODS FOR USE WITH THIS RETEXTURE
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards by Hvergelmir[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30062/?]Dwemer Beards by Anuiel[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34147/?]aMidianBorn wolf armor and skyforge weapons by CaBal120[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72800/?]ESO Nord Armor HDT by bbdlqek1[/url] (For ingame cape Physics)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15703/?]Pretty Combat Animations by dualsun[/url] (For ingame II idle animation)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59580/?]Executioner or Headsmans Axe Idle Animation by tomtomsatnav1234[/url] (For Steel Standing idle animation)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33292/?]Unique Uniques by InsanitySorrow[/url] (For the 2 handed Mace in Steel Standing)

[/size]E) COMMENT, RATE AND ENDORSE :)
author: Bagarok
